Posts.Content: Thank you for responding!  I'll tell my parents about the lump and most probably have an appointment with the doctor about these . My skin may be irritated when I waxed my armpit and may have cuase this lump. God bless :)
Posts.Title: 1 inverted nipple and small armpit lump

Posts.Content: Thank you for responding! :) Your respond is really helpful and you're right, I  should avoid searching symptoms in google!  I believe I'm not fighting any infections? I may be wrong, but I feel good and I'm attending our school's basketball practices! Thank you for the hug! It was really sweet of you :)  God bless :)
Posts.Title: 1 inverted nipple and small armpit lump

Posts.Content: I'm turning 18 soon and recently something hurt under my right armpit and found a lump beneath the skin of my armpit (you can't really tell until you try to feel it) it hurts when I touch it. So, I search it on the net and found symptoms of breast cancer. That's when I noticed my right nipple is inverted. The nipple does not hurt and there is no lump on my breast. After some days, the lump is less tender but there is still a lump.  *sorry, english is not my first language. I hope it makes sense. I'm really anxious.
